changeSet.comment: Updating the concept DISCHARGE to Discharge
changeSet.sql: UPDATE concept SET is_set = 0 WHERE concept_id = (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name = 'DISCHARGE' and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED'); UPDATE concept_name SET name = 'Discharge' WHERE name = 'DISCHARGE' and concept_name_type in ('FULLY_SPECIFIED','SHORT');

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) from visit_type where name = 'IPD';

changeSet.comment: Add IPD visit type
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO visit_type(name, description, creator, date_created, retired, uuid) VALUES ('IPD', 'IPD visit', 1, now(), 0, uuid());
